title: FS T213-2 HOFers SGC Graded - Prices Reduced
author: t213

posts.post_title: FS T213-2 HOFers SGC Graded - Prices Reduced
posts.post_content:
FS or would trade for T217s or a 1920 Zeenut Crawford. These are just back from SGC - any white scuffs on scans are from my scanner, holders are shiny and new. Thanks, Andy

Cobb Portrait SGCA very slightly short, but a nice image WAS $550 NOW $495

Cobb Bat Off Shoulder SGC10 obvious wear WAS $500 NOW $465

Mathewson SGC20 image presents much better than the grade, see left border for what I believe are the offending wear spots resulting in the 20 grade WAS $400 NOW $365

Speaker SGC40 for this very condition sensitive issue, this is a BEAUTY WAS $750 NOW $695
